changeSet.sql: CREATE FUNCTION get_random_cleverbank_account_id() RETURNS bigint AS 'SELECT id FROM accounts WHERE bank_id = 1 OFFSET floor(random() * (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM accounts WHERE bank_id = 1)) LIMIT 1;' LANGUAGE SQL;

changeSet.sql: WITH series AS (SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(1, 50) AS sery) INSERT INTO transactions (amount, type, currency, created_date, sender_account_id, receiver_account_id) SELECT ROUND((RANDOM() * 1000)::numeric, 2), CASE WHEN s.sery % 2 = 0 THEN 'TRANSFER'::transaction_type_enum WHEN s.sery % 3 = 0 THEN 'WITHDRAW'::transaction_type_enum ELSE 'REFILL'::transaction_type_enum END, CASE WHEN s.sery % 2 = 0 THEN 'BYN'::currency_enum WHEN s.sery % 3 = 0 THEN 'RUB'::currency_enum WHEN s.sery % 5 = 0 THEN 'EUR'::currency_enum ELSE 'USD'::currency_enum END, '2023-07-01'::DATE + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 30) + 1)::INTEGER * INTERVAL '11 DAY', CASE WHEN s.sery % 2 = 0 THEN get_random_cleverbank_account_id() WHEN s.sery % 3 = 0 THEN get_random_cleverbank_account_id() ELSE NULL END, CASE WHEN s.sery % 2 = 0 THEN FLOOR(RANDOM() * 50) + 1 WHEN s.sery % 3 = 0 THEN NULL ELSE get_random_cleverbank_account_id() END FROM series s
